WELCOME TO THE "STARUSHKO LUB" - BIG GAME, ABOUT YOU!
Translate elderly across the road, full of DEATHLY CARS! Only you can save very very poor greybeards!

Maybe it is seems easy...but who know, how many cars and not cars can be in a road...

Controls: Left and Right arrow, "R" to restart.
Soundtrack by Kevin Macleod (incompetech)
